title: Swig President Says It's a Great Time to Buy a Home
itunes:title: Swig President Says It's a Great Time to Buy a Home
description:
Kent Swig, President at Swig Equities, explains how the coronavirus is impacting the real estate market as the Fed's emergency rate cut has made home buying more attractive. He also discusses news of Bill Gates stepping down from the Microsoft board.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
